signature.instructions: Summarize the following content according to the perspective and the asked question. The abstractive summary created should detect the spans in the different answers describing the particular perspective. Utilize the definition of the perspective and the tone information for accurate summary generation.

The tone reflects the stylistic approach the summary should take.
